imdb.plot outline: On this episode of War Stories: Vietnam, we explore the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund's Wall That Heals as it made a stop in Swoyersville Borough. The Wall That Heals travels to communities throughout the country to honor the U.S. armed forces who served in Vietnam and pay respect to the more than 58,000 men and women who died in the war.
imdb.title: War Stories: Vietnam the Wall That Heals
akas: War Stories: Vietnam the Wall That Heals (United States)
plot: On this episode of War Stories: Vietnam, we explore the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund's Wall That Heals as it made a stop in Swoyersville Borough.
